top_stories.title: Goertek Unveils Next-Generation Technologies at CES 2026
top_stories.description: Driving smarter interaction across acoustics, optics, and electronics On the opening day of CES 2026, Goertek unveiled a comprehensive suite of technological innovations designed to power the next generation of intelligent devices. The company is contributing to the evolution of human-machine interaction with new developments across three strategic domains: AI... The post Goertek Unveils Next-Generation Technologies at CES 2026 first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Beyond the Hallucination: How AI is Rebuilding AAA Production Pipelines from a Vacuum
top_stories.description: Evgeniy Tolstykh did not just ask an AI to draft a polite email or summarize a meeting in his recent research. He challenged it to build a AAA game production department from the ground up. In a head-to-head experiment, Tolstykh tasked a Large Language Model (LLM) with generating art roadmaps, Jira structures, and production estimates, […]
top_stories.author: Stewart Rogers

In a head-to-head experiment, Tolstykh tasked a Large Language Model (LLM) with generating art roadmaps, Jira structures, and production estimates, […]

top_stories.title: Steel, Sensors and Silicon: How Caterpillar Is Bringing Edge AI to the Jobsite
top_stories.description: At CES, Caterpillar reveals how it’s integrating NVIDIA technologies, from NVIDIA Jetson Thor to speech models, to transform the world’s heavy industries.
top_stories.author: Madison Huang
top_stories.content: At CES, Caterpillar reveals how it’s integrating NVIDIA technologies, from NVIDIA Jetson Thor to speech models, to transform the world’s heavy industries.

top_stories.title: Spotify adds real-time listening activity to Messages
top_stories.description: Spotify announced on Wednesday new features for its Messages function, allowing users to view friends’ real-time listening activity and send Jam requests within the iOS and Android apps. The updates aim to enhance in-app social interactions and retain users who previously shared music externally. Users activate the listening activity feature by accessing Settings, selecting Privacy […]
top_stories.author: Aytun Çelebi
